catalog_script_client.name: Date Of Birth Validation

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_0ea55be647f3211098f58977536d437b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Newly Onboarded Employees' Details">110bc57147b7211098f58977536d43b2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d232ae9647b3211098f58977536d4357</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Date Of Birth Validation</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') 
   {
      return;
   }
	var rightNow = new Date();
	var dob = new Date(g_form.getValue('date_of_birth'));
	var diff = Math.abs(rightNow.getTime() - dob.getTime()); //time difference in milliseconds

	//millisec divided by 1000 to convert to seconds, then divided by 3600 to convert to hours, then divided by 24 to convert to days, then divided by 365 to convert to years. So 1000*3600*24*365.
	var diffYears = Math.ceil(diff/ (1000 * 3600 * 24*365));	

	if(diffYears<=18)
	{
		g_form.addErrorMessage(getMessage('The onboardee should be more than 18 years of age....'));
		g_form.clearValue('date_of_birth');
	}
	else
	{
		g_form.addInfoMessage(getMessage('The date of birth is accepted....'));
	}   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-06 09:31:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0ea55be647f3211098f58977536d437b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Date Of Birth Validation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_0ea55be647f3211098f58977536d437b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-06 12:31:13</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
